name: FOREVER REACHING
description:
"Can you help find all my lost memories" ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ FOREVER REACHING is a first-person adventure/exploration game where you help a spirit find her four lost memories and allow her to finally be free. Do you have the courage to help her? 

Make sure to follow me on itch to see more of my awesome games ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ CONTROLS Use WASD to move Hold SHIFT to run

 Left mouse button to collect a memory ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ SPECIAL THANKS

 I want to thank the following people for helping me in my game development journey. Mikael, Brianer, Arkania, David Wehle, Gypynkt and the entire GDU community ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

make sure to leave a comment and enjoy FOREVER REACHING
